input.sentences: here we are lining up for the fun run .
on you mark | get set go !
running in this costume is not so easy | but i see the finish line
the people cheering as we finish the run .

output.sentences: The runners we're all at the starting line.
The organizer shouted " Ready, set, go!"
The runners took off running as fast as they could.
Awards were given & received, depending on how well they did.
As a bonus, all runners could go down the inflatable slide.
